title: Handle a Major Track Outage
description: A bridge washout has closed a main rail line for an extended period. A manager must re-route all affected trains.

tasks.description: Log the track outage in the system for a specific segment of the network.
tasks.expected_outcome: The main line is marked as out-of-service.

tasks.description: Identify all trains that were scheduled to use that track segment.
tasks.expected_outcome: A list of affected trains is generated.

tasks.description: For each affected train, find a viable detour route, potentially using trackage rights on another railroad's lines.
tasks.expected_outcome: New, longer routes are found for all trains.

tasks.description: Update the schedule and routing for each train and notify the crews of their new instructions.
tasks.expected_outcome: All affected trains are re-routed to bypass the outage.
